long_description: The Sugoi Jackie knickers for women wick moisture away from your skin to keep you dry, warm, and comfortable on your cool-weather runs. Matte-finished nylon knit blended with spandex provides moisture management and full stretch. Supportive mesh panel behind knees is blended with spandex for excellent stretch, recovery and breathability. Features a zippered back pocket and an inside key pocket. Flatlock seams reduce chafing; lined crotch gusset enhances comfort. The Sugoi Jackie knickers for women feature an elastic waist with drawstring. Closeout.
short_description: The Sugoi Jackie knickers for women wick moisture away from your skin to keep you dry, warm, and comfortable on your cool-weather runs.
